meanings.definition: Examining one's own thoughts and feelings.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys introspective moments to reflect on her day.
meanings.sent2: He often introspective before making important decisions.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed introspective as it stared out the window.
meanings.sent4: The introspective nature of the painting left viewers pondering its meaning.
meanings.sent5: The introspective melody of the song evoked deep emotions in the listeners.

meanings.sent1: Her introspective nature led her to analyze every situation carefully.
meanings.sent2: The artist's work had an introspective quality that drew viewers in.
meanings.sent3: The introspective cat sat quietly in the corner, lost in thought.
meanings.sent4: The introspective gaze of the old man seemed to see beyond the present.
meanings.sent5: The introspective atmosphere of the room made it perfect for deep conversations.

meanings.sent1: The introspective student always pondered the meaning of life.
meanings.sent2: Her introspective nature made her a great listener to others' problems.
meanings.sent3: The introspective clouds seemed to be lost in their own thoughts.
meanings.sent4: The introspective design of the garden created a peaceful retreat.
meanings.sent5: The introspective expression on her face revealed her deep contemplation.
